name: Run Turkey Run
description:
Run Turkey Run is a remake of Classic Desktop Game of same name by ZapSpot. Since the original is long gone, and we were getting our hands dirty with Godot engine, we decided to remake it for the nostalgia and why the heck not reasons :)

How to Play

- Use WASD to move your Egg/Turkey
- Eat the worms by simply reaching them.
- Don’t eat the prohibited worm appearing on the top right of the screen
- Avoid bumping into gopher
- Pick up powerups to help you grow faster (Star, Shoes, Shield)
- Avoid Hazards like Water Baloon, Anvil and Bomb
